DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluates the feasibility of the NBI technique in the detection of early cancer lesions.
DOC.brief_title: Excision Limits of Oral Cavity Tumor by Narrow Band Imaging
DOC.criteria: Primitive epidermoid cancer of the oral cavity, proved by histology, not treated previously, patient having a surgery No previous surgery for this cancer Age > 18 years Patient affiliated to health insurance Consent signed by the patient Metastatic or recurrent disease Health care impossibilities for geographic, social, psychic reasons
